alps.title: Meta-Preferences - Client Preferences for Service Responses

doc.value:
This is a semantic profile for [RWMBook](http://b.mamund.com/rwmbook). Services [SHOULD](http://b.mamund.com/rfc2119) provide a link relation with the value of 'meta'. Clients [MAY](http://b.mamund.com/rfc2119) follow this link to get a list of all the content variation parameters supported by the service API.

 The contents of the resulting representation [SHOULD](http://b.mamund.com/rfc2119) reflect the available options for the current runnin context. For example, logged in users might see different values than anonymous users.
